backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus product and order types and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping paymentâ€‘flow changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files across pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme definitions using warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, manifest, icons, and script bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying branding, colors, icons, and standalone display settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing layout with navigation, cart badge, admin UI gating, and footer.
Component showing install prompts or iOS instructions based on PWA installability state.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderMessag: Alert banner for admins informing them about new order visibility in the management system.
frontend/src/components/PaymentDetailsSe: Displays payment method, optional payee details, and transaction reference using a card layout.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines frontend payment config and helpers to check configuration and get the default payee.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToHomeScreen.ts: Provides installability detection and prompting logic for adding the PWA to the home screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations for products, orders, profiles, and admin checks using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a dairy-focused color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRatesPage.tsx: Admin UI for authenticating, viewing, editing, refreshing, and saving product prices with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, handles loading/errors, displays items with updated prices, and allows clearing or editing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including form fields, profile autofill, payment instructions, cart validation, and order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, business hours, and a brief business description.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the landing page with hero banner, feature highlights, and links to shop or contact.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details, payment info, pickup note generation, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Lets users look up orders by ID, validates input, fetches order data, and displays order and payment details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays products with loading, error, and category filtering, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Provides cart state management with add/remove/update, persistence, totals, and price syncing.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItemType interface for cart items.
frontend/src/utils/cartPricing.ts: Calculates cart totals and latest prices, marking missing products and computing line totals.
frontend/src/utils/payment.ts: Validates payee info, builds UPI deep links, and formats structured payment details for order notes.
frontend/src/utils/rapidoPickupNote.ts: Generates a formatted pickup note for Rapido containing order metadata and item list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and issues related to replacing UPI payments with a GPay-only flow.
